title: TDP-43 seeding activity in the olfactory mucosa of patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
details: M Vizziello, IL Dellarole, A Ciullini, R Pascuzzo… - Molecular …, 2025
abstract: Background In recent years, the seed amplification assay (SAA) has enabled the identification of pathological TDP-43 in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) and olfactory mucosa (OM) of patients with genetic forms of frontotemporal dementia (FTD) and …
